issue.title: [Rust] Pretty print columns
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11898](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11898). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can pretty print a slice of record batches, but it's also useful to pretty print a slice of columns.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11898?focusedCommentId=17297716) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
